title: Never Watched One Piece - Episode 180: Showdown in the Ancient Ruins! Sky God Eneru's Goal!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Blog post reviewing Episode 180, noting that watching Wyper defeat Enel was 'the most gratifying thing I've seen in One Piece since Luffy's defeat of Crocodile.' Discusses Wyper's use of Seastone and the Reject Dial.
